Desc.entry: A group of people aged over 50 years and over who want to keep mind and body active through chairobic exercise with a fully qualified trainer and activities such as skittles, hoopla, board games, cards, bingo etc. Aims to combat isolation and provide a friendy place for pensioners to come and talk through their problems. Organises bus pass days out, lunches and shopping trips. New members welcome.

category.entry: CLUBS FOR OLDER PEOPLE - POSTAL DISTRICT 13
